TITLE: Episode 66 - Lingering Milk Stench with @dentintheworld
DESCRIPTION: This week, Jessica joins me again and we have a conversation with one of our favorite people in the twittersphere, Dent. We talk about how great Tom Woods is, how small wins matter, what Bernie Sanders probably smells like, a debate on whether or not student loans will ever be forgiven, how worthless college degrees are, the war on drugs, sex work, and much more. Join us for a good conversation with people who actually like each other.
